Class R2LightShaderDefines

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.shaders.core.R2LightShaderDefines

  • public final class R2LightShaderDefines
extends Object
    Preprocessor definition values for light shaders.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String R2_LIGHT_SHADER_OUTPUT_TARGET_DEFINE
      The name of the define used to control the light shader output.
      static String R2_LIGHT_SHADER_OUTPUT_TARGET_IBUFFER
      The output of the light shader is an image buffer.
      static String R2_LIGHT_SHADER_OUTPUT_TARGET_LBUFFER
      The output of the light shader is a light buffer.
